name: The Cupid and his liver
description:
"He's been looking at me in the window with a smile on his face for a few years, like he knows something I don't... that smile scares me." 
"He knew, from the beginning,  that this love would be my grave, it would be my end, that's when I understood that smile..." 

handmade work using techniques in oil psstel on paper, digitized and animated rm mp4. I was inspired by tragedies and tried to portray a totem or intelligence that would be "responsible" for creating these self-destructive loves. a reflection on what we are calling love.
